headline: StrongDM Builds Momentum With Industry Recognition and 300% Growth
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., November 19, 2025--StrongDM, the universal access management company, today highlighted growing momentum for its modernized approach to Privileged Access, marked by recognition in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for Privileged Access Management and inclusion in the Deloitte Technology Fast 500. The company also debuted Leash, an open-source project extending continuous authorization to agentic AI.

headline: CFO optimism around AI rises as adoption levels off
summary: Gartner research suggests a pause in AI adoption is giving CFOs room to learn from early pilots and build confidence.
